sentence.Network_en: Industrialism began to usurp the production and distribution functions of the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 工业化生产已开始篡夺家庭生产和分配的功能.

sentence.Network_en: Like so many of his contemporaries , Twain was not whole - hearted in his praise of industrialism.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克·吐温如同他许多同时代的人,在赞扬工业文明的时候,有点三心二意.

sentence.Network_en: But the social tension due to the development of urban industrialism grew.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,由于城市工业主义的发展,社会紧张局势日益加剧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: industrialisation 工业化industrialism 产业主义industrialist 工业家
...一定是人类自进入都市生活始便具有的经验，实际上是自文明初始便已有的经验。所有那些为我们所熟悉的反对“工业主义”（industrialism）、资本主义及过度精致生活（Overrefinement）的论点，在很大程度上都是对一种新的生活方式的.

entry.tran: 工业主义,产业主义(指经济主要依靠工业的社会)
entry.def: Industrialism is the state of having an economy based on industry.

means.word_mean: 1. an economic system built on large industries rather than on agriculture or craftsmanship

auth_sentence.content: Since industrialism, indeed since the beginning of agriculture, humans have been changing the face of the planet.
